description:
Called to fetch a list of supported add-on deployment methods.

Callback signature:

&$deployMethods

Arguments:

  1. array $deployMethods - an associative array of $methodId-$Class pairs.

To use this event properly, assign $deployMethods[$method] = $class. Ensure the phrase "deployment_method_$method" exists.
This class MUST be defined as follows:

class MyClassName extends AddOnInstaller\Deployment\AbstractDeployment
{
	// functionality to extend/override
}

Event Hint: Name of the class that is being loaded.
